sentence: Jones and other federal judges have been reluctant to order last-minute changes, noting that the Supreme Court has repeatedly said federal judges shouldn't alter rules on the eve of an election.? READ MORE: Stacey Abrams launches 2nd campaign for Georgia governor In the months preceding the 2018 election, Abrams, a Democrat, accused her Republican opponent in the governor's race, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of using his position as Georgia's chief elections officer to promote voter suppression, an allegation Kemp has vehemently denied.
author: Kate Brumback
title: Election lawsuit backed by Stacey Abrams goes to trial in Georgia

sentence: Stacey Abrams' net worth over $3 million, compared to $109,000 when she first ran four years ago In the months preceding the 2018 election, Abrams, a Democrat, accused her Republican opponent in the governor's race, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of using his position as Georgia's chief elections officer to promote voter suppression, an allegation Kemp has vehemently denied.
title: Stacey Abrams-backed election lawsuit heads to trial
